#summary A reference page of tags used by Jsdoc Toolkit.

== Tags For Functional Doclets ==
Within doc comments of type: class, method or function, you may have one or more of these tags.

|| *tag title*        || *syntax*                                                ||                                                               ||
|| param          || @param _{type}_ *name* _description_    || explain a function parameter.                 ||
|| param          || @param _{type}_ [*name*] _description_  || an optional parameter.                           ||
|| returns         || @returns _{type}_ _description_               || explain a function return value.              ||
|| throws         || @throws _{type}_ _description_                || explain an error a function can throw.    ||

== Attribute Tags ==
Some tags allow you to mark a doclet as having a particular attribute.

|| *tag title*     || *syntax*          ||                                     ||
|| private      || @private       || indicates the thing being documented is not intended to be used outside its own file.      ||
